• The price of the instrument, expressed in terms of the equivalent selling price, excluding any taxes and other expenses, of the fair value of the instrument.
• The fair value of the instruments at the end of the reporting period, expressed in terms of the present value of the estimated future cash flows, based on observable market data and the expected returns on the instrument.
• The fair value of the instruments that are not traded in an active market, expressed in terms of the estimated fair value of the instrument at the end of the reporting period, based on observable market data and the expected returns on the instrument.
